lines.text:
[referring to one of the terrorists]
The woman was very cruel.
Yes. She's more like a man. You know what I mean?

[to a hostage]
You, hands on your seat!
[the hostage does not react and Bradigan hits him]
You don't have to hit him.

[forcibly escorting hostages near one of the closed doors]
Sit on the floor!
You don't have to do this! We'll do anything you want! What are we doing here?
If they storm the plane, *you* will be the first to die!
I'm not going easy... a man doesn't have much in life, but at least he can choose when to die.
